Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame 2: The Secret of the Bell
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Musical, Romance
Writer: Jule Selbo (screenplay by), Flip Kobler (screenplay by), Cindy Marcus (screenplay by)
Actors: Jason Alexander, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Tom Hulce, Paul Kandel
Plot: Quasimodo goes into action when a magician seeks to steal one of the bells of Notre Dame.
